## ZoomControls class

Class for a zoom controls.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ZoomControls implements IPositionable 
```
**Implements:** [IPositionable](./blockly.ipositionable.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(workspace)](./blockly.zoomcontrols._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>ZoomControls</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [id](./blockly.zoomcontrols.id.md) |  | string | The unique ID for this component that is used to register with the ComponentManager. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [createDom()](./blockly.zoomcontrols.createdom.md) |  | Create the zoom controls. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.zoomcontrols.dispose.md) |  | Disposes of this zoom controls. Unlink from all DOM elements to prevent memory leaks. |
|  [getBoundingRectangle()](./blockly.zoomcontrols.getboundingrectangle.md) |  | Returns the bounding rectangle of the UI element in pixel units relative to the Blockly injection div. |
|  [init()](./blockly.zoomcontrols.init.md) |  | Initializes the zoom controls. |
|  [position(metrics, savedPositions)](./blockly.zoomcontrols.position.md) |  | Positions the zoom controls. It is positioned in the opposite corner to the corner the categories/toolbox starts at. |
